attributes.action: donate money to genetic disease research
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present there is no cure for this often fatal disease that affects so many children and adults.i have recently lost my baby who was 4 months old who had an horrific death and i know other babies who have died in this way. I feel the goverment needs to put more money into research to help find a cure for this
